title: Trading Love
description: Trading Love is a book that introduces financial and investment literacy through a simple story that most people can relate to, it mirrors investment decisions with relationship decisions. Arian; a Lebanese woman that endures the juxtaposition of her country's norms, builds up a portfolio of her relationships to gauge future ones the same way Asset Managers build portfolios through equity focus lists.The story ends with a strong message that will shed a new light on what should be truly meaningful in our lives.
author: Sabine J Saadeh
